sentences.en: a high level of political aspiration
An aspiration psychrometer could destroy a delicate moisture balance.
sentences.cn: 抽吸式干湿球温度计能够破坏细微的水分平衡.

sentences.en: Aspiration inking is available from the perspective of pore size account.
sentences.cn: 吸不朱度可以从孔隙不小小角度举行思考.

sentences.en: Aspiration removes lightweight trash by blowing it away.
sentences.cn: 轻的杂质由气吸装置经过吹风吹除.

sentences.en: He nurses an aspiration to be a poet.
His initial aspiration was unwavering; he was determined to be a doctor.
sentences.cn: 他初志难移, 一心要成为一名医生.

sentences.en: Hulls may be removed by aspiration on screens.
sentences.cn: 脱下的种皮,可由筛子上的气吸装置吸除.

sentences.en: In certain people the level of aspiration may be permanently deadened or lowered.
sentences.cn: 有一些人,他的愿望可能永远保持着僵化或者低下的程度.

sentences.en: It revealed an aspiration for freedom from imposed limitations.
sentences.cn: 它表现出冲破种种束缚去追求自由的强烈愿望.

sentences.en: Man's aspiration should be as lofty as the stars.
sentences.cn: 人的志气应当象天上的星星那么高.

sentences.en: Other causes of unconsciousness predisposing to aspiration lung abscess are convulsive seizures.
sentences.cn: 造成吸入性肺脓肿昏迷的其他原因,有惊厥发作.

sentences.en: Otherwise the gap between aspiration and reality will continue to widen with each passing year.
sentences.cn: 否则,理想与现实之间的差距逐年扩大.

sentences.en: Pulmonary aspiration is a dreaded surgical complication.
sentences.cn: 肺吸入是一种可怕的外科并发症.

sentences.en: Reflux leads to recurrent or refractory aspiration pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 反流可引起复发的难治的吸入性肺炎.
将官之职位是他梦寐以求的目标.

sentences.en: The well being of children is the most cherished aspiration of UNICEF.
sentences.cn: 为孩子们谋求福祗是我们最大的渴望.

words.tran_cn: 有雄心壮志的；（生活形态等）梦寐以求的
有抱负的；追求…的；高耸的
成功指南；处世自助手册
[医] 抽吸器，[医] 吸引器；吸气器

trans.tran_en: a strong desire to have or achieve something
